item.title: League of Legends: Wild Rift (@wildrift) on X
item.description: Hi friends, We’re rolling out 2 updates to improve your Hexrift experience. -T-Hex Mecha: the player riding the Mecha will have their champion icon added beside the T-Hex Mecha health bar. -Hextech Toolkit: animation adjustment so it’s clearer when the Toolkit is ready to be
